display_long_description:
# Use your plasma saber to deflect laser bolts and slice your way through waves of enemies!

Enter a world of futuristic technology and ancient cyber-swordsmanship in this thrilling VR experience. As an cybernetic enhanced mercenary, wield powerful energy weapons and high-tech gadgets to defend yourself against an onslaught of mechanical beasts, sent to hunt down and destroy the last of your kind.

Shin Zero is a single player, arcade combat and sword slicing game where you face off against various challenges, enemy types and large bosses while you block, dodge and defend yourself against their attacks.

[media]

# Face Different Challenges:
- Gun wielding droids.
- Cyber swordsmen.
- High security laser beams & walls.
- Remote drones.
- Kamikaze guards.
- Laser turrets.
- Bosses and more.

[media]
# Use your extended abilities to fight!
